subSubSection.paragraph: Double mounted to a point, labelled: "Golfito Costa Rica / WB Heed HL Carson Jun Jul 1959 / HOLOTYPE Drosophila comosa Whlr. [pink label] / Drosophila comosa Wheeler", deposited in NMNH.

caption.paragraph: Figure 9. Drosophila comosa Wheeler, 1968 (ungrouped). Holotype from Golfito, Costa Rica, male terminalia (NMNH). A, epandrium, cerci and surstyli, oblique posterior view. B, idem, setae and microtrichiae intentionally omitted, posterior view. C, hypandrium and gonopods, posterior view. D-H , aedeagus, paraphyses and aedeagal apodeme, several views from dorsal through ventral. Scale bar: 0.1 mm.
